page.title: 09Sport in Kirdford.
page.content: People in Kirdford play tennis as there is one hard court.There are 17 members in the cricket club.At present the outstanding 'all round' cricketer is 65 years of age!The football club has 18 members.Some of the team have formed a darts team for the Foresters Arms. The stoolball club has as many as 16 members .Matches are played all over West Sussex because stoolball originated in Sussex.The hunt that meets in the Kirdford area is the Chiddingfold, Leconfield,and Cowdray hunt.People follow on foot and on horseback.
